name: github_scrape_repo
description: Scrape detailed info about a GitHub repository including stars, forks, description, languages, recent activity, and README excerpt.

steps.code: const name = document.querySelector('[itemprop="name"], strong[itemprop="name"] a')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const owner = document.querySelector('[itemprop="author"] a, .author a')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const desc = document.querySelector('[itemprop="description"], .f4.my-3')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const stars = document.querySelector('#repo-stars-counter-star, a[href*="/stargazers"] .Counter, .social-count')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const forks = document.querySelector('#repo-network-counter, a[href*="/forks"] .Counter')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const watchers = document.querySelector('#repo-watchers-counter')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const topics = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.topic-tag, a[data-octo-click="topic_click"]')).map(t => t.textContent.trim()); const languages = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.BorderGrid-row .Progress-item')).map(l => l.getAttribute('aria-label') || '').filter(Boolean); const readme = document.querySelector('#readme article, .markdown-body')?.textContent?.trim()?.substring(0, 500) || ''; const license = document.querySelector('a[data-analytics-event*="LICENSE"], .octicon-law')?.parentElement?.textContent?.trim() || ''; return { name: owner + '/' + name, description: desc, stars: stars, forks: forks, watchers: watchers, topics: topics, languages: languages, license: license, readme_excerpt: readme, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: result
steps.label: Extract repo details
